Name.description: The name of the final product, indicating its purpose or function.

IngredientName.description: The specific name of each ingredient used in the formulation.

Amount.description: The precise quantity of the ingredient required, expressed in appropriate units (e.g., grams, milliliters).

Formula.description: A list of ingredients along with their corresponding amounts needed to create the final product.

Step.description: The sequential number indicating the order of steps in the preparation process.

Instruction.description: A detailed description of the actions to be performed at this step, including any specific techniques or precautions.

Procedure.description: A step-by-step guide outlining the process to prepare the final product, ensuring clarity and ease of understanding.

items.description: Supplementary information, tips, or considerations related to the formulation or procedure that may enhance understanding or effectiveness.

Notes.description: Additional notes that provide context, clarification, or helpful hints regarding the product or its preparation.

items.description: References related to the formulation, use, or effectiveness of the product.

Literature.description: A list of references providing background or evidence for the formulation.
